golngman esdabliwpiya hara dama keti kalak shatmanwadi wyaparayata bandi siti athara, wadi kal noyawama makswadaya prathikshepa kaleya. 1946 di esdabliwpiyen nerapa damimen ikbithi moro samajawadi deshapalanaya athhara dama amarikanu adhirajyawadaye shithala yuddhayata sahayogaya dun athara, guptha sahithyaya prakashayata path karana dhanawath prakashakayek bawata pathwiya. 1976 nowambaraye di, jathyanthara kamituwa wenuwen liyon trotski ghathanaya sambandhayen paryeshanaye yedi sitina atharathura, mama filiks moro hamuwimi.

emenma parlimenthu katayuthu ha janamadhya amathyanshayata jathika chithrapati sansthawa, mahinda rajapaksha jathika teli sinama udyanaya aadi kala sanskruthika katayuthuwalata adala aayathana pawara eya thawaduratath digu karamin sidukara thibune adhyapana amathyanshaya yatathata purawidya departhamenthuwa, tawarhol rangahala padanama, prasiddha rangum palaka mandalaya, jathika prasangika kala madhyasthanaya, jathika kala mandalaya, gramodaya janakala kendraya, ape gama, jathika lekhanarakshaka departhamenthuwa ha madhyama sanskruthika aramudala yana kala ha sanskruthika katayuthu wishayayanta eeta pera ayathwa thibu aayathana pathkirimaya.

mithya drushtikayan wu owuhu budu sasuna winasha karannata boho de kalaha.deshapremi sinhala wyapara haraha aakramanikayangen rata daya samaya muda gaththa da nidahasa labimen pasu me rate balayata pathwuwan da siduwu waradi niwaradi karannata unandu wu bawak nopene.ee nisa me pilibandawa shasana bharadhari maha therun wahansela peramuna gathayuthuwa thibe.buddha kalaye siti maha kashyapa maha rahathan wahanse wani shasana bharadharihu buddha shasanaye aarakshawata piyawara gathha.pasu kalaye di ee ee yugawala siti maha therun wahansela peramuna gena shasanaye unnathiya sandaha kriya kalaha.
